vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Gad living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.5.15;
son of: Guni (H1476H);
father of: Ahi (H0277)
§ Abdiel = "servant of God"
a Gadite, son of Guni and father of Ahi and one who settled in the land of Bashan in the time of king Jotham of Judah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Guní; tribu de Gad
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
押比疊 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "神的僕人"
迦得人古尼的兒子, 亞希的父親, 於猶大王約坦時期居住在巴珊地 (代上5:15)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
押比迭 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "神的仆人"
迦得人古尼的儿子, 亚希的父亲, 于犹大王约坦时期居住在巴珊地 (代上5:15)
